CardId.description: The canonical (synthetic) Xfuze Card id for the Card if identifiable and has some unique key e.g Card_D365_987654

CardNumber.description: The native Card number of the Card master if identifiable and has some unique key e.g 987654

CardSerial.description: The native card serial number e.g 9123445567787654

SourceBatchNumber.description: The batch number from the source that this card was released  e.g 9123445567787654

CardType.description: The type of the Card e.g Gift, Payment, Membership etc

CardPurpose.description: The purpose of the usage of the Card e.g GiftPayments, Subscription etc

CardValidFrom.description: The valid from / effective date of the  Card

CardValidTo.description: The valid to / expiry date of the  Card

IsPrimary.description: Is this Card a primary one? e.g Y

IsVerified.description: Is this Card verified by an official Card lookup / validator? e.g Y

IsEncrypted.description: Is this Card encrypted? e.g Y

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
